document.full_text: the bank of england held interest rates at a record-low 0.5 percent on thursday despite a surge in inflation, ceding the limelight to the european central bank, which was expected to raise borrowing costs less than an hour later.
document.title: bank of england holds rates, leaves limelight to ecb
lines_and_colors: the bank of england held interest rates at a record-low 0.5 percent on thursday despite a surge in inflation, ceding the limelight to the european central bank, which was expected to raise borrowing costs less than an hour later.
